channel.title: What to post in this Qubes-Whonix forum and what not.
channel.description:
As a rule of thumb:
* Everything that happens "inside" the virtual machines is Qubes-Whonix and belongs into this sub forum. * Everything that happens "outside" the virtual machine is Qubes and the [Qubes help](https://www.qubes-os.org/help/) should be consulted.
-----
Some examples:
* EFI -> [Qubes support](https://www.qubes-os.org/support/) * Errors by by Qubes VM Manager (QVMM) -> [Qubes support](https://www.qubes-os.org/support/) * libvirtError -> [Qubes support](https://www.qubes-os.org/support/) * Issues that also apply to Debian based VMs. -> [Qubes support](https://www.qubes-os.org/support/) * `error: Failed to save domain whonix-ws-dvm to /var/lib/qubes/appvms/whonix-ws-dvm/dvm-savefile` -> [Qubes support](https://www.qubes-os.org/support/) * `error: internal error: Failed to save domain '11' with libxenlight` -> [Qubes support](https://www.qubes-os.org/support/) * `qubes-dom0-update` installation issues -> [Qubes support](https://www.qubes-os.org/support/) * `qubesctl` issues -> [Qubes support](https://www.qubes-os.org/support/) * Qubes Updater -> [Qubes support](https://www.qubes-os.org/support/)
-----
* [systemcheck](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Systemcheck) -> [Whonix forum](https://forums.whonix.org) or [Qubes-Whonix forum](https://forums.whonix.org/c/qubes)
-----
If you don't know where to post, throw a dice and do not hesitate to ask either in Qubes-Whonix forum or Qubes support channels. You will be notified if there is a more appropriate place if necessary.
-----
If the reported issue is a general Whonix issue unspecific to Qubes-Whonix the forum thread might be moved to the [general Whonix support forum](https://forums.whonix.org/c/support).
-----
(Moderators feel free to edit this post.)
-----
See also:
* [Free Support Principle](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Support#Free_Support_Principle) * [Free Support Principle Rationale](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Support#Free_Support_Principle_Rationale) * [ Linux User Experience versus Commercial Operating Systems](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Reporting_Bugs#Linux_User_Experience_versus_Commercial_Operating_Systems)

item.title: What to post in this Qubes-Whonix forum and what not.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
As a rule of thumb:

  • Everything that happens “inside” the virtual machines is Qubes-Whonix and belongs into this sub forum.
  • Everything that happens “outside” the virtual machine is Qubes and the Qubes help should be consulted.

Some examples:

  • EFI → Qubes support
  • Errors by by Qubes VM Manager (QVMM) → Qubes support
  • libvirtError → Qubes support
  • Issues that also apply to Debian based VMs. → Qubes support
  • error: Failed to save domain whonix-ws-dvm to /var/lib/qubes/appvms/whonix-ws-dvm/dvm-savefile → Qubes support
  • error: internal error: Failed to save domain '11' with libxenlight → Qubes support
  • qubes-dom0-update installation issues → Qubes support
  • qubesctl issues → Qubes support
  • Qubes Updater → Qubes support
  • systemcheck → Whonix forum or Qubes-Whonix forum

If you don’t know where to post, throw a dice and do not hesitate to ask either in Qubes-Whonix forum or Qubes support channels. You will be notified if there is a more appropriate place if necessary.

If the reported issue is a general Whonix issue unspecific to Qubes-Whonix the forum thread might be moved to the general Whonix support forum.

(Moderators feel free to edit this post.)

See also:

  • Free Support Principle
  • Free Support Principle Rationale
  • Linux User Experience versus Commercial Operating Systems

Read full topic
item.source: What to post in this Qubes-Whonix forum and what not.
